channel.title: Winnepeg on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Winnepeg on My New Hugo Site

item.title: I'm presenting at a conference!
item.description: One of the projects I’ve worked on at BCIT is Catt-Trax2. The website is for Danny Catt who is traveling through South America and Antarctica exploring conservation and sustainability issues and talking to the people in those regions working with those issues daily. He’s taking photos, video, and sound clips of this journey and blogging about his experiences. I helped architect the website and did some design and implementation work on it.
